import React from 'react'; import { AppBar, Toolbar, Typography, Button, Container, Box, Grid, Paper } from '@mui/material'; import { createTheme, ThemeProvider } from '@mui/material/styles'; import LinkedInIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LinkedIn'; import GitHubIcon from '@mui/icons-material/GitHub'; import { Link as ScrollLink, Element } from 'react-scroll'; import './HomePage.css'; const theme = createTheme({ palette: { primary: { main: '#1976d2', }, secondary: { main: '#fff', }, }, typography: { h1: { fontSize: '3rem', fontWeight: 700, marginBottom: '1rem', }, h2: { fontSize: '2rem', fontWeight: 500, marginBottom: '1rem', }, body1: { fontSize: '1.25rem', marginBottom: '1.5rem', }, button: { fontSize: '1rem', fontWeight: 600, }, }, }); function HomePage() { return ( Resume Management Tool for LaTeX
Welcome to the Resume Management Tool for LaTeX Simplify your resume creation process with ease Our tool helps you manage and generate professional resumes using LaTeX. Get started now by uploading your .tex file and let us handle the rest. Key Features Feature 1 Description of feature 1. Highlight the benefits and functionality. Feature 2 Description of feature 2. Explain how this feature can help the user. Feature 3 Description of feature 3. Focus on user experience and benefits. Get Started with Our Tool Upload your LaTeX resume file and see the magic happen. Our tool will process your file and provide you with a professional resume. Â© 2024 Your Company Name. All rights reserved. ); } export default HomePage;
